text: Ana nkusimonga kum'bichilila kwenu chikumbusyo kuumila kwa M'mbuje gwenu kupitila mwa mundu jwakutyochela mwa jenumanja kuti antetele? Soni kumbuchilani ndema jaŵam'bisile jenumanja kuŵa ŵawinjila panyuma pa ŵandu ŵa Nuhu, ni an'jonjechesye kusapanguka mu kagumbidwe (pakumpa ilu yamachili, yekulungwakulungwa soni yeleuleu), basi kumbuchilani indimba ya Allah kuti m'be ŵakupunda.”
